name: contingency_leased_liened_items_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will you remove the Leased or Liened Items contingency?
label: Leased Items Days
description: Regardless of your answer, you will always have up to 5 days after receiving a document to review it.
tips: Review all documentation related to leased or liened items to understand ongoing obligations. The standard review period is up to 17 days after offer acceptance.
small_print: The 5-day review period begins when you receive documents about leased or liened items, regardless of the removal deadline.

internal.notes: Days until leased/liened items contingency removal

contingency_leased_liened_items_days.name: contingency_leased_liened_items_days

suggested.hint: The typical review period is between 10 and 17 days after offer acceptance.

contingency_leased_liened_items_days.tooltip: Enter the number of days for leased/liened items review
